mapper.insert: insert into notice values((select nvl(max(noticeno),0)+1 from notice),#{title}, #{content}, #{wname}, #{passwd}, 0, sysdate);
mapper.select:
SELECT noticeno, title, wname, viewcnt, ndate FROM notice
wname like '%'||#{word}||'%'
title like '%'||#{word}||'%'
content like '%'||#{word}||'%'
title like '%'||#{word}||'%' or content like '%'||#{word}||'%'
order by ndate desc )
)where r>=#{sno} and r<=#{eno}

select count(*) from notice
wname like '%'||#{word}||'%'
title like '%'||#{word}||'%'
content like '%'||#{word}||'%'
title like '%'||#{word}||'%' or content like '%'||#{word}||'%'
SELECT noticeno, title, content, wname, passwd, viewcnt, ndate FROM notice WHERE noticeno=#{noticeno}
